summary: MY CARS RADIO WENT OUT FIRST THEN AC BLOWING WARM AIR THEN ALL GAUGES GOING CRAZY AND HAD A BURNING SMELL OF PLASTIC.   WAS ON A CITY STREET CAME UP TO STOP SIGN AND CAR JUST DIED. THIS COULD OF BEEN VERY DANGEROUS. THANK GOODNESS I WASN'T ON HIGHWAY. I AM TOLD IT IS MY ALTERNATOR AND THIS SHOULD BE INCLUDED WITH OTHER RECALLS OF ALTERNATORS. I SEE THEY DO HAVE RECALLS ON 2012 CHRYSLER 300 FOR ALTERNATOR, BUT MY VIN # ISN'T INCLUDED IN THE RECALL, BUT SHOULD BE INCLUDED.
